newsitem.title: FINLAND: Benefon, Ericsson to cooperate in NMT 450.
newsitem.headline: Benefon, Ericsson to cooperate in NMT 450.

text.p: Finnish mobile phones maker Benefon Oy said in a statement on Thursday it had agreed with Swedish Ericsson Radio Systems on cooperation to serve and develop NMT 450i mobile phone markets.

"The agreement is aimed at providing the best possible choise of system equipment, mobile phones and related services to NMT (Nordic Mobile Telephone) 450i system operators and end users worldwide," it said.
"Both companies see a continuing important role for the NMT 450i systems standard," it added.
It said the two companies would continue to develop new products "to create new long term business opportunities in the NMT 450 market".
